patterns: are there any delivery charges to be paid?
responses: delivery charges are added to the total amount of your order
delivery charges are applies to all orders below 399
free delivery is applicable on orders upto 399

patterns: how do i view pickup requests?
how do i schedule my pickup order?
what are the pickup options available?
responses: steps to view pickup requests :settings>account>pickup
steps to schedule pickup orders :settings>account>schedule pickup>enter time
there is no pickup fee
you can choose your pickup options in the settings

patterns: how long does it takes for the order to be delivered?
by what time will the order be delivered?
how long is the delivery time?
responses: the order will be delivered in 30 mins
it takes about 30 mins for the order to be delivered
our delivery time is 30 mins after your order is placed
the order will arrive at your doorstep in 30 mins after it is confirmed

responses: discount codes are available at the checkout

notifications are provided once the order is placed and after delivered to your doorstep
